SEARCH
Package view.Doctor.appointments.widgets

Class PatientDetailsTable

java.lang.Object
lib.uilib.framework.Widget
view.Doctor.appointments.widgets.PatientDetailsTable
public class PatientDetailsTable extends Widget
A Widget that displays the details of a patient. This widget is designed to provide doctors with a clear view of the details of a specific patient.
Since:
2024-11-16

  • Method Details

    • build

      public String build(BuildContext context)
      Builds the UI for displaying the patient's details in a table format. The table contains the following information:
      • Patient's Name
      • Date of Birth
      • Gender
      • Age
      • Blood Type
      Specified by:
      build in class Widget
      Parameters:
      context - the BuildContext used for rendering the widget.
      Returns:
      a String representing the built table UI.
